Beginner's Protector.name: Beginner's Protector
Beginner's Protector.desc: A polearm as straight as a flag pole. Well suited to most combat situations, it has an imposing presence when swung.

Iron Point.name: Iron Point
Iron Point.desc: Sharp and pointy at one end, it is a balanced weapon that is quite popular among travelers.

White Tassel.name: White Tassel
White Tassel.desc: A standard-issue weapon of the Millelith soldiers. It has a sturdy shaft and sharp spearhead. It's a reliable weapon.

refinements.name: Sharp
refinements.desc: Increases Normal Attack DMG by **24%**.

refinements.name: Sharp
refinements.desc: Increases Normal Attack DMG by **30%**.

refinements.name: Sharp
refinements.desc: Increases Normal Attack DMG by **36%**.

refinements.name: Sharp
refinements.desc: Increases Normal Attack DMG by **42%**.

refinements.name: Sharp
refinements.desc: Increases Normal Attack DMG by **48%**.

Halberd.name: Halberd
Halberd.desc: A polearm with an axe blade mounted on top that can deal quite a lot of damage. It's favored by the Millelith officers.

refinements.name: Heavy
refinements.desc: Normal Attacks deal an additional **160%** ATK as DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

refinements.name: Heavy
refinements.desc: Normal Attacks deal an additional **200%** ATK as DMG. This effect can only occur once every 10s.

refinements.name: Heavy
refinements.desc: Normal Attacks deal an additional **240%** ATK as DMG. This effect can only occur once every 10s.

refinements.name: Heavy
refinements.desc: Normal Attacks deal an additional **280%** ATK as DMG. This effect can only occur once every 10s.

refinements.name: Heavy
refinements.desc: Normal Attacks deal an additional **320%** ATK as DMG. This effect can only occur once every 10s.

Black Tassel.name: Black Tassel
Black Tassel.desc: An exceptionally powerful polearm that also offers a simple but elegant solution to the issue of the easily stained white tassel.

refinements.name: Bane of the Soft
refinements.desc: Increases DMG against slimes by **40%**.

refinements.name: Bane of the Soft
refinements.desc: Increases DMG against slimes by **50%**.

refinements.name: Bane of the Soft
refinements.desc: Increases DMG against slimes by **60%**.

refinements.name: Bane of the Soft
refinements.desc: Increases DMG against slimes by **70%**.

refinements.name: Bane of the Soft
refinements.desc: Increases DMG against slimes by **80%**.

Dragon's Bane.name: Dragon's Bane
Dragon's Bane.desc: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

refinements.name: Bane of Flame and Water
refinements.desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by **20%**.

refinements.name: Bane of Flame and Water
refinements.desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by **24%**.

refinements.name: Bane of Flame and Water
refinements.desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by **28%**.

refinements.name: Bane of Flame and Water
refinements.desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by **32%**.

refinements.name: Bane of Flame and Water
refinements.desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by **36%**.

Prototype Starglitter.name: Prototype Starglitter
Prototype Starglitter.desc: A hooked spear discovered hidden away in the Blackcliff Forge. The glimmers along the sharp edge are like stars in the night.

refinements.name: Magic Affinity
refinements.desc: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by **8%** for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

refinements.name: Magic Affinity
refinements.desc: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by **10%** for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

refinements.name: Magic Affinity
refinements.desc: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by **12%** for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

refinements.name: Magic Affinity
refinements.desc: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by **14%** for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

refinements.name: Magic Affinity
refinements.desc: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by **16%** for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

Crescent Pike.name: Crescent Pike
Crescent Pike.desc: An exotic weapon with an extremely long blade on the top and a crescent blade at the bottom. It found its way into Liyue through foreign traders. With practice, it can deal heavy damage.

refinements.name: Infusion Needle
refinements.desc: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to **20%** of ATK for 5s.

refinements.name: Infusion Needle
refinements.desc: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to **25%** of ATK for 5s.

refinements.name: Infusion Needle
refinements.desc: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to **30%** of ATK for 5s.

refinements.name: Infusion Needle
refinements.desc: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to **35%** of ATK for 5s.

refinements.name: Infusion Needle
refinements.desc: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to **40%** of ATK for 5s.

Blackcliff Pole.name: Blackcliff Pole
Blackcliff Pole.desc: A weapon made of blackcliff and aerosiderite. There is a dark crimson glow on its cold black sheen.

refinements.name: Press the Advantage
refinements.desc: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by **12%** for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

refinements.name: Press the Advantage
refinements.desc: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by **15%** for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

refinements.name: Press the Advantage
refinements.desc: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by **18%** for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

refinements.name: Press the Advantage
refinements.desc: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by **21%** for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

refinements.name: Press the Advantage
refinements.desc: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by **24%** for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Deathmatch.name: Deathmatch
Deathmatch.desc: A sharp crimson polearm that was once a gladiator's priceless treasure. Its awl has been stained by the blood of countless beasts and men.

refinements.name: Gladiator
refinements.desc: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by **16%** and DEF is increased by **16%**. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by **24%**.

refinements.name: Gladiator
refinements.desc: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by **20%** and DEF is increased by **20%**. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by **30%**.

refinements.name: Gladiator
refinements.desc: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by **24%** and DEF is increased by **24%**. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by **36%**.

refinements.name: Gladiator
refinements.desc: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by **28%** and DEF is increased by **28%**. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by **42%**.

refinements.name: Gladiator
refinements.desc: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by **32%** and DEF is increased by **32%**. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by **48%**.

Favonius Lance.name: Favonius Lance
Favonius Lance.desc: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.

refinements.name: Windfall
refinements.desc: CRIT Hits have a **60%** chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every **12**s.

refinements.name: Windfall
refinements.desc: CRIT Hits have a **70%** chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every **10.5**s.

refinements.name: Windfall
refinements.desc: CRIT Hits have a **80%** chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every **9**s.

refinements.name: Windfall
refinements.desc: CRIT Hits have a **90%** chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every **7.5**s.

refinements.name: Windfall
refinements.desc: CRIT Hits have a **100%** chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every **6**s.

Royal Spear.name: Royal Spear
Royal Spear.desc: This polearm was once cherished by a member of the old nobility that governed Mondstadt long ago. Although it has never seen the light of day, it is still incomparably sharp.

refinements.name: Focus
refinements.desc: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by **8%**. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

refinements.name: Focus
refinements.desc: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by **10%**. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

refinements.name: Focus
refinements.desc: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by **12%**. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

refinements.name: Focus
refinements.desc: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by **14%**. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

refinements.name: Focus
refinements.desc: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by **16%**. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

Dragonspine Spear.name: Dragonspine Spear
Dragonspine Spear.desc: A spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.

refinements.name: Frost Burial
refinements.desc: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a **60%** chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to **80%** of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to **200%** of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

refinements.name: Frost Burial
refinements.desc: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a **70%** chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to **95%** of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to **240%** of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

refinements.name: Frost Burial
refinements.desc: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has an **80%** chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to **110%** of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to **280%** of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

refinements.name: Frost Burial
refinements.desc: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a **90%** chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to **125%** of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to **320%** of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

refinements.name: Frost Burial
refinements.desc: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a **100%** chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to **140%** of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to **360%** of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

Lithic Spear.name: Lithic Spear
Lithic Spear.desc: A spear forged from the rocks of the Guyun Stone Forest. Its hardness knows no equal.

refinements.name: Lithic Axiom: Unity
refinements.desc: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a **7%** ATK increase and a **3%** CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

refinements.name: Lithic Axiom: Unity
refinements.desc: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a **8%** ATK increase and a **4%** CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

refinements.name: Lithic Axiom: Unity
refinements.desc: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a **9%** ATK increase and a **5%** CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

refinements.name: Lithic Axiom: Unity
refinements.desc: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a **10%** ATK increase and a **6%** CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

refinements.name: Lithic Axiom: Unity
refinements.desc: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a **11%** ATK increase and a **7%** CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

Kitain Cross Spear.name: Kitain Cross Spear
Kitain Cross Spear.desc: A special lance that was once used by a famed warrior who guarded the Tatarigami on Yashiori Island.

refinements.name: Samurai Conduct
refinements.desc: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by **6%**. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates **3** Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

refinements.name: Samurai Conduct
refinements.desc: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by **7.5%**. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates **3.5** Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

refinements.name: Samurai Conduct
refinements.desc: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by **9%**. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates **4** Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

refinements.name: Samurai Conduct
refinements.desc: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by **10.5%**. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates **4.5** Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

refinements.name: Samurai Conduct
refinements.desc: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by **12%**. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates **5** Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

\"The Catch\".name: "The Catch"
\"The Catch\".desc: In the distant past, this was the beloved spear of a famed Inazuman bandit.

refinements.name: Shanty
refinements.desc: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by **16%** and Elemental Burst CRIT Rate by **6%**.

refinements.name: Shanty
refinements.desc: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by **20%** and Elemental Burst CRIT Rate by **7.5%**.

refinements.name: Shanty
refinements.desc: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by **24%** and Elemental Burst CRIT Rate by **9%**.

refinements.name: Shanty
refinements.desc: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by **28%** and Elemental Burst CRIT Rate by **10.5%**.

refinements.name: Shanty
refinements.desc: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by **32%** and Elemental Burst CRIT Rate by **12%**.

Wavebreaker's Fin.name: Wavebreaker's Fin
Wavebreaker's Fin.desc: A naginata forged from luminescent material deep in the ocean depths. It was once the possession of the tengu race.

refinements.name: Watatsumi Wavewalker
refinements.desc: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by **0.12%**. A maximum of **40%** increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

refinements.name: Watatsumi Wavewalker
refinements.desc: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by **0.15%**. A maximum of **50%** increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

refinements.name: Watatsumi Wavewalker
refinements.desc: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by **0.18%**. A maximum of **60%** increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

refinements.name: Watatsumi Wavewalker
refinements.desc: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by **0.21%**. A maximum of **70%** increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

refinements.name: Watatsumi Wavewalker
refinements.desc: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by **0.24%**. A maximum of **80%** increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

Moonpiercer.name: Moonpiercer
Moonpiercer.desc: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It is shaped like a giant arrow and can be used as a spear.

refinements.name: Stillwood Moonshadow
refinements.desc: After triggering Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, a Leaf of Revival will be created around the character for a maximum of 10s. When picked up, the Leaf will grant the character **16%** ATK for 12s. Only 1 Leaf can be generated this way every 20s. This effect can still be triggered if the character is not on the field.

refinements.name: Stillwood Moonshadow
refinements.desc: After triggering Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, a Leaf of Revival will be created around the character for a maximum of 10s. When picked up, the Leaf will grant the character **20%** ATK for 12s. Only 1 Leaf can be generated this way every 20s. This effect can still be triggered if the character is not on the field.

refinements.name: Stillwood Moonshadow
refinements.desc: After triggering Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, a Leaf of Revival will be created around the character for a maximum of 10s. When picked up, the Leaf will grant the character **24%** ATK for 12s. Only 1 Leaf can be generated this way every 20s. This effect can still be triggered if the character is not on the field.

refinements.name: Stillwood Moonshadow
refinements.desc: After triggering Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, a Leaf of Revival will be created around the character for a maximum of 10s. When picked up, the Leaf will grant the character **28%** ATK for 12s. Only 1 Leaf can be generated this way every 20s. This effect can still be triggered if the character is not on the field.

refinements.name: Stillwood Moonshadow
refinements.desc: After triggering Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, a Leaf of Revival will be created around the character for a maximum of 10s. When picked up, the Leaf will grant the character **32%** ATK for 12s. Only 1 Leaf can be generated this way every 20s. This effect can still be triggered if the character is not on the field.

Primordial Jade Winged-Spear.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
Primordial Jade Winged-Spear.desc: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.

refinements.name: Eagle Spear of Justice
refinements.desc: On hit, increases ATK by **3.2%** for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by **12%**.

refinements.name: Eagle Spear of Justice
refinements.desc: On hit, increases ATK by **3.9%** for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by **15%**.

refinements.name: Eagle Spear of Justice
refinements.desc: On hit, increases ATK by **4.6%** for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by **18%**.

refinements.name: Eagle Spear of Justice
refinements.desc: On hit, increases ATK by **5.3%** for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by **21%**.

refinements.name: Eagle Spear of Justice
refinements.desc: On hit, increases ATK by **6%** for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by **24%**.

Skyward Spine.name: Skyward Spine
Skyward Spine.desc: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's firm resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.

refinements.name: Black Wing
refinements.desc: Increases CRIT Rate by **8%** and increases Normal ATK SPD by **12%**. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a **50%** chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals **40%** of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

refinements.name: Black Wing
refinements.desc: Increases CRIT Rate by **10%** and increases Normal ATK SPD by **12%**. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a **50%** chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals **55%** of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

refinements.name: Black Wing
refinements.desc: Increases CRIT Rate by **12%** and increases Normal ATK SPD by **12%**. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a **50%** chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals **70%** of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

refinements.name: Black Wing
refinements.desc: Increases CRIT Rate by **14%** and increases Normal ATK SPD by **12%**. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a **50%** chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals **85%** of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

refinements.name: Black Wing
refinements.desc: Increases CRIT Rate by **16%** and increases Normal ATK SPD by **12%**. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a **50%** chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals **100%** of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

Vortex Vanquisher.name: Vortex Vanquisher
Vortex Vanquisher.desc: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.

refinements.name: Golden Majesty
refinements.desc: Increases Shield Strength by **20%**. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by **4%** for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

refinements.name: Golden Majesty
refinements.desc: Increases Shield Strength by **25%**. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by **5%** for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

refinements.name: Golden Majesty
refinements.desc: Increases Shield Strength by **30%**. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by **6%** for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

refinements.name: Golden Majesty
refinements.desc: Increases Shield Strength by **35%**. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by **7%** for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

refinements.name: Golden Majesty
refinements.desc: Increases Shield Strength by **40%**. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by **8%** for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Staff of Homa.name: Staff of Homa
Staff of Homa.desc: A "firewood staff" that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.

refinements.name: Reckless Cinnabar
refinements.desc: HP increased by **20%**. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on **0.8%** of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional **1%** of Max HP.

refinements.name: Reckless Cinnabar
refinements.desc: HP increased by **25%**. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on **1%** of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional **1.2%** of Max HP.

refinements.name: Reckless Cinnabar
refinements.desc: HP increased by **30%**. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on **1.2%** of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional **1.4%** of Max HP.

refinements.name: Reckless Cinnabar
refinements.desc: HP increased by **35%**. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on **1.4%** of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional **1.6%** of Max HP.

refinements.name: Reckless Cinnabar
refinements.desc: HP increased by **40%**. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on **1.6%** of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional **1.8%** of Max HP.

Engulfing Lightning.name: Engulfing Lightning
Engulfing Lightning.desc: A naginata used to "cut grass." Any army that stands before this weapon will probably be likewise cut down...

refinements.name: Timeless Dream: Eternal Stove
refinements.desc: ATK increased by **28%** of Energy Recharge over the base 100%. You can gain a maximum bonus of **80%** ATK. Gain **30%** Energy Recharge for 12s after using an Elemental Burst.

refinements.name: Timeless Dream: Eternal Stove
refinements.desc: ATK increased by **35%** of Energy Recharge over the base 100%. You can gain a maximum bonus of **90%** ATK. Gain **35%** Energy Recharge for 12s after using an Elemental Burst.

refinements.name: Timeless Dream: Eternal Stove
refinements.desc: ATK increased by **42%** of Energy Recharge over the base 100%. You can gain a maximum bonus of **100%** ATK. Gain **40%** Energy Recharge for 12s after using an Elemental Burst.

refinements.name: Timeless Dream: Eternal Stove
refinements.desc: ATK increased by **49%** of Energy Recharge over the base 100%. You can gain a maximum bonus of **110%** ATK. Gain **45%** Energy Recharge for 12s after using an Elemental Burst.

refinements.name: Timeless Dream: Eternal Stove
refinements.desc: ATK increased by **56%** of Energy Recharge over the base 100%. You can gain a maximum bonus of **120%** ATK. Gain **50%** Energy Recharge for 12s after using an Elemental Burst.

Calamity Queller.name: Calamity Queller
Calamity Queller.desc: A keenly honed weapon forged from some strange crystal. Its faint blue light seems to whisper of countless matters now past.

refinements.name: Extinguishing Precept
refinements.desc: Gain **12%** All Elemental DMG Bonus. Obtain Consummation for 20s after using an Elemental Skill, causing ATK to increase by **3.2%** per second. This ATK increase has a maximum of 6 stacks. When the character equipped with this weapon is not on the field, Consummation's ATK increase is doubled.

refinements.name: Extinguishing Precept
refinements.desc: Gain **15%** All Elemental DMG Bonus. Obtain Consummation for 20s after using an Elemental Skill, causing ATK to increase by **4%** per second. This ATK increase has a maximum of 6 stacks. When the character equipped with this weapon is not on the field, Consummation's ATK increase is doubled.
